heading: HB02462
0: AN ACT SEPARATING THE MONTANEZA NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL − CERDEÑA NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL EXTENSION IN BARANGAY CERDEÑA, MUNICIPALITY OF MALABUYOC, PROVINCE OF CEBU FROM THE MONTANEZA NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL AND CONVERTING IT INTO AN INDEPENDENT NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL TO BE KNOWN AS THE CERDEÑA (MALABUYOC) NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR

House Bill/Resolution NO. HB02462
FULL TITLE : AN ACT SEPARATING THE MONTANEZA NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL − CERDEÑA NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL EXTENSION IN BARANGAY CERDEÑA, MUNICIPALITY OF MALABUYOC, PROVINCE OF CEBU FROM THE MONTANEZA NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL AND CONVERTING IT INTO AN INDEPENDENT NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL TO BE KNOWN AS THE CERDEÑA (MALABUYOC) NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
